peril.views.slick.components

Class ProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.components.ProgressBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public final class ProgressBar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    Encapsulates the behaviours of a progress bar that can be displayed on screen.
    Since:
    2018-02-23
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Component

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int height
      The pixel height of this ProgressBar on screen.
      private Point position
      The Point position of the ProgressBar.
      private int progress
      The progress of this ProgressBar.
      private int total
      The total number tick this ProgressBar must perform to be to be completed.
      private int width
      The pixel width of this ProgressBar on screen.
